name: TaskJuggler Project File
summary: Learn about .TJP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TJP files are saved as textual documents written in a proprietary declarative programming language. Each file consists of a root project file and the contents of sub-files included in the main file.

description: Project file created with TaskJuggler, an open source project management tool; used for managing and analyzing tasks, resources, costs, productivity, etc.
